expected: A dynamic warmup for soccer includes jogging, high knees, butt kicks, leg swings, and dynamic stretches.
Ladder drills, cone zig-zags, and shuttle runs are effective for agility.

query: How can I improve my upper body strength?
expected: Incorporate push-ups, pull-ups, and resistance training into your routine.

query: Suggest a weekly training plan for a beginner marathon runner
expected: Start with 3-4 runs per week, gradually increasing distance, and include rest days.

query: Give me a warm-up routine before a tennis match.
expected: Light jogging, arm circles, dynamic stretches, and shadow swings are ideal.
